content.rendered:
Important Documents

Important Documents

  • Transfer Instructions
  • Change of Address *
  • New International Student Check-In Form *

Updating Your I-20 Record

  • Request for Reduced Course Load
  • Request to Extend I-20 End Date
  • Request for F2 Dependent I-20 *

Other Requests

  • Request to Verify Enrollment *
  • Concurrent Enrollment

Employment Updates

Curricular Practical Training

  • CPT Request Form
  • CPT Submission *

Optional Practical Training

  • OPT Request Form
  • OPT Application Checklist
  • Pre-OPT Review Form *
  • OPT Change of Employment *

* Form submissions require logging in using your University of La Verne credentials.
